pages.text: $(item)Potash Mulch$() is made from $(item)Wood Chips$(), $(item)Ash$(), and an appreciable source of nitrogen, such as $(thing)meat$() or $(item)Bone Meal$().

$(item)Mulched Farmland$() is a temporary effect created by placing $(item)Potash Mulch$() on either $(item)Moisturized Farmland$() or a plant growing on top.$(p)$(info) $(item)Mulched Farmland$() is resistant to being trampled and plants growing on top will periodically receive a $(thing)bone meal effect$() for the duration of the mulch effect.
